wikipedia_page.main: David Lloyd Jones, Lord Lloyd-Jones, PC, FLSW (born 13 January 1952) is a British judge and legal scholar. He served as a Justice of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom from 2017 to 2022 and also served as a member of the Court of Appeal of England and Wales and as a chairman of the Law Commission prior to joining the Supreme Court.
